Parameters: A status code indicating the result of the operation.
The room data that was created if successful. The room can be null if the @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#RealTimeMultiplayer#create_E@ operation failed.
onRoomCreated(int, com.google.android.gm.Description: Called when the client attempts to create a real-time room. The real-time room can be created by calling the @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#RealTimeMultiplayer#create_E@ operation. Possible status codes include: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_OK_E@ if data was successfully loaded and is up-to-date. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_CLIENT_RECONNECT_REQUIRED_E@ if the client needs to reconnect to the service to access this data. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_REAL_TIME_CONNECTION_FAILED_E@ if the client failed to connect to the network @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MULTIPLAYER_DISABLED_E@ if the game does not support multiplayer. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR_E@ if an unexpected error occurred in the service.
onRoomCreated(int, com.google.android.gm.FullName: public abstract void onRoomCreated (int statusCode, Room room)

Parameters: A status code indicating the result of the operation.
The data of the room that was joined. The room can be null if the @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#RealTimeMultiplayer#join_E@ operation failed.
onJoinedRoom(int, com.google.android.gms.Description: Called when the client attempts to join a real-time room. The real-time room can be joined by calling the @B_com#google#android#gms#games#multiplayer#realtime#RealTimeMultiplayer#join_E@ operation. Possible status codes include: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_OK_E@ if data was successfully loaded and is up-to-date. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_CLIENT_RECONNECT_REQUIRED_E@ if the client needs to reconnect to the service to access this data. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_REAL_TIME_CONNECTION_FAILED_E@ if the client failed to connect to the network @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_MULTIPLAYER_DISABLED_E@ if the game does not support multiplayer. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR_E@ if an unexpected error occurred in the service.
onJoinedRoom(int, com.google.android.gms.FullName: public abstract void onJoinedRoom (int statusCode, Room room)

Parameters: A status code indicating the result of the operation.
ID of the real-time room which was left.
onLeftRoom(int, java.lang.String).Description: Called when the client attempts to leaves the real-time room. Possible status codes include: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_OK_E@ if operation was successfully completed. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR_E@ if an unexpected error occurred in the service.
onLeftRoom(int, java.lang.String).FullName: public abstract void onLeftRoom (int statusCode, String roomId)

Parameters: The fully connected room object. The room can be null if it could not be loaded successfully.
onRoomConnected(int, com.google.android..Description: Called when all the participants in a real-time room are fully connected. This gets called once all invitations are accepted and any necessary automatching has been completed. Possible status codes include: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_OK_E@ if data was successfully loaded and is up-to-date. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_CLIENT_RECONNECT_REQUIRED_E@ if the client needs to reconnect to the service to access this data. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesStatusCodes#STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR_E@ if an unexpected error occurred in the service.
onRoomConnected(int, com.google.android..FullName: public abstract void onRoomConnected (int statusCode, Room room)

ClassDesc: The listener invoked when the state of the room has changed.
